name: Mantel Clock
maker: Clock case attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire, Design attributed to Jean-Guillaume Miotte, clock dials enameled by Henri-François Dubuisson
description: Mantel Clock; Clock case attributed to Pierre-Philippe Thomire (French, 1751 - 1843, master 1772), Design attributed to Jean-Guillaume Miotte (French, 1746 - 1810), clock dials enameled by Henri-François Dubuisson (French, active until 1823, master 1769); Paris, France; about 1785; Gilt and patinated bronze; enameled metal; vert Maurin des Alpes marble; white marble; 53.3 x 63.8 x 23.5 cm (21 x 25 1/8 x 9 1/4 in.); 82.DB.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Mantel Clock
medium: Gilt and patinated bronze; enameled metal; vert Maurin des Alpes marble; white marble
